Title: Tox: Remote Code Execution
Synopsis: A vulnerability has been discovered in Tox which may lead to remote code execution.

Background.Text: Tox is easy-to-use software that connects you with friends and family without anyone else listening in.

Description.Text: A vulnerability has been discovered in btrbk. Please review the CVE identifier referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: A stack-based buffer overflow allows remote attackers to crash the process or potentially execute arbitrary code via a network packet.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All Tox users should upgrade to the latest version:
